text: 3.2 1 Ti 5.9, 2 Ti 2.24 Pen bɨ olap Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdep ak yenɨm agɨl nɨgup ak, anɨgɨl yonɨmuŋ.3.2-7 Tat 1.6-9 Bɨ sayn tep, binɨb ogɨnap nɨgel kɨlop tep gɨnɨmuŋ. Bin nokom olap dɨnɨmuŋ. Bɨ takaw sayn tep agɨl, gos nɨgtep gɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop gɨtep gek, nop agjunɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Ag dap kal mɨgan ne lɨnɨmuŋ. Takaw agñɨ tep gɨnɨmuŋ.
